user.title: Solar Forecast ML
user.description:
Configure your intelligent solar forecast.

Tip: Provide your system size in kWp to improve initial predictions.

All settings can be changed later!

data.inverter_power_sensor: Inverter Power Sensor (current output in W, optional)

data_description.weather_entity: Recommendation: Use your local weather service for accurate forecasts.
data_description.power_entity: This sensor must reset daily to 0 (e.g., sensor.solar_daily_yield).
data_description.plant_kwp: Example: 10.5 kWp. Used for better initial predictions; the system learns automatically afterwards.
data_description.update_interval: How often sensor data should be collected. The actual forecast is created once daily in the morning.
data_description.forecast_solar_sensor: A sensor like sensor.forecast_solar_today to blend with our ML model (optional).
data_description.lux_sensor: Illuminance sensor (e.g., from weather station) for light intensity influence (optional).
data_description.temp_sensor: Temperature sensor for heat influence on yield (optional).
data_description.wind_sensor: Wind speed sensor (negative influence during strong winds, optional).
data_description.uv_sensor: UV index sensor for radiation influence (optional).
data_description.inverter_power_sensor: Your sensor for current solar output (e.g., sensor.solar_current_power in W). Checks if more than 10W (inverter on) – helps set forecasts to 0 during outages.
data_description.inverter_daily_yield: Your sensor for cumulative daily yield (e.g., sensor.solar_daily_production from Fronius/SMA/Anker, in kWh). Optional, for robust checks during night/battery switching (more than 0.1 kWh = day active).
data_description.enable_diagnostic: Enables Solar Forecast ML Status sensor in dashboard – shows Running normally with details (e.g., inverter status). Great for transparency.
data_description.enable_hourly: Enables Solar Forecast ML Next Hour sensor (kWh). Based on hourly weather forecast – ideal for automations like EV charging during peak times.
data_description.notify_forecast: Shows daily forecast at 6:00 AM for today and tomorrow (disabled by default).
data_description.notify_learning: Shows learning result at 11:00 PM with predicted vs. actual (disabled by default).
data_description.notify_inverter: Warns when inverter appears offline (0W), max. once per day (disabled by default).
data_description.notify_startup: Shows notification on successful integration startup (enabled by default).

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Solar Forecast ML
reconfigure.description:
Change sensors and settings.

The integration will reload automatically.

data_description.weather_entity: The weather entity for weather forecasts.
data_description.power_entity: The sensor for daily solar yield (must reset daily).
data_description.plant_kwp: Size of your solar system in kWp (e.g., 10.5).
data_description.update_interval: How often sensor data is collected (in seconds).
data_description.inverter_power_sensor: Optional inverter power sensor (current output in W).

abort.reconfigure_successful: Configuration successfully updated! The integration has been reloaded.

init.title: Solar Forecast ML Options
init.description:
Enable/disable features and notifications.

Tip: All notifications are disabled by default to avoid spam.

data_description.enable_diagnostic: Shows a status sensor with info like Running normally, last update, inverter status, etc.
data_description.enable_hourly: Creates a sensor for next-hour forecast (based on hourly weather forecast).
data_description.notify_forecast: Notification at 6:00 AM with forecast for today and tomorrow (including accuracy).
data_description.notify_learning: Notification at 11:00 PM with learning result: Predicted vs. Actual, deviation in percent.
data_description.notify_inverter: Warns you when inverter appears offline (0W), max. once per day.
data_description.notify_startup: Shows notification on successful integration startup with base capacity.
